site_name: Caps House10-12 Carlisle StreetLondonW1D 3JT
description: Variation of condition 25 of planning permission dated 16th October 2013 (RN:13/00930/FULL) for the Variation of Condition 25 of planning permission dated 20 April 2011 (RN: 11/05583) for demolition of Nos. 10-12 Carlisle Street and erection of new building of basement, ground and four upper floors for use as a hotel.  Alterations to shopfronts at Nos. 21-25 St Anne's Court, replacement of first floor glazed rear extension with new extension, new extension at second and third floor level at rear of No. 21 St Anne's Court with additional plant floor level on top, all in connection with the use of the basement and part ground floors for light industrial purposes (Class B1c), and remainder of  ground, first, second and third floors as part of hotel with Nos. 10-12 Carlisle Street. NAMELY; to allow for the use of the basement and ground floor unit premises fronting St Anne's Court as either retail (Class E(a)), financial and professional services (Class E(c)) or office accommodation (Class E (g)). (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
